originalText.text:
Better 24/7 bodega option.

Sandwiches: 3.5/5
Drink options: 4/5
Juice & smoothies: 3.5/5
Service: 4/5

Best chopped cheese in the area. It will save your life at 3am, Chad.

Beef patty, hip hop chips and coconut nut pinnacle ice cream? Check.

You’re welcome

originalText.text: I’m so disappointed. Soha has been my go to for late night sandwiches and snacks. Unfortunately last night took a wrong turn. My friend and I ordered a tuna melt wrap and also a bbq chicken wrap. To our surprise when we got the delivery a bloody bandaid was attached to our food. Not only that, my tuna melt was dark and looked like it was sitting out for over 24-48 hours. So sad because I truly did love their spicy chicken cutlet and now it just left a horrid taste in my mouth.

originalText.text:
Very rude first of all.
I ordered small juice and the guy started to make more portion- so I said it is okay to make it large cup because I do not want to see food going to waste. And the juice spilt on the counter as it slips from my hand. I requested them for a new one and he looked at me with anger filled resentful eyes and shouted at me “it is YOU that spilt, not US!”. He could politely said no without this drama. His colleague had to say “take it easy bro” Never returning there ever again. Too bad, I already tipped in the tip box.

originalText.text: FORMER frequent customer but the Staff is TERRIBLE ! The cook literally is the worst. They make you feel like you’re money is no good. Definitely over priced and they have the nerve to Nickel & Dime you. Be prepared to pay $1 if you want your Ketchup on the side . Overall Just find another place to spend your money this place is just embarrassing. Staff needs to do better smh

originalText.text: I normally come to this deli everyday besides being really expensive and some of the staff being really rude and not welcoming they are an ok spot. Tonightt the cook had a chip on his shoulder and purposely screwed up my food either that or he just doesn’t know what the hell he’s doing. I ordered a chicken Caesar wrap and he purposely made it wrong twice and I had to tell her how to do it. He also took so very long to get other customers before me to finish my order I will never go back to this deli again because their staff let their bitter problems getting the way of their job.
